JobFullDesc: The Role: ESG Sales SpecialistThe Location: New York, NY (Flexible)The Team: We have an exciting new business sales opportunity within the North American ESG Specialist Sales team.  You will be part of a very specialized, highly talented global team within S&P Market Intelligence, one of four main divisions within S&P Global.  The team wants to create powerful, positive societal change and help the world transition to a sustainable, low carbon economy as well as generating strong revenue growth for our business.  You will be expected to build collaborative relationships with external and internal stakeholders and will be an integral part of a unit that reports to the Head of Institutional Sales, North America.The Impact: The role requires excellent public speaking, verbal and written communication skills, as well as a good working understanding of how investors (Investment Banks, Asset Managers, Asset Owners, Insurance, Commercial Banks and Development Banks) do, and could, integrate ESG and environmental data to create financial products and manage investment risks, which are essential to a more sustainable and efficient economy. What’s in it for you: As a key member of the sales team, you will have the opportunity to lead and manage ESG business development activities.
